validation.decimal: The :attribute field must have :decimal decimal places.

validation.doesnt_contain: The :attribute field must not contain any of the following: :values.

pages.privacy.title: Privacy Notice
pages.privacy.summary.minimal: We collect only what we need to run your account and membership.
pages.privacy.summary.stripe: Payments are processed by Stripe; card data never touches our servers.
pages.privacy.summary.rights: You can access, correct, or delete your data at any time.
pages.privacy.toc.title: Contents
pages.privacy.who.heading: Who we are
pages.privacy.who.body: Spillhuset (Org.no: 917616140) provides community events and memberships for gamers. Address: Skollerudveien 5, 1353 Bærums Verk, Norway.
pages.privacy.data.heading: Data we collect
pages.privacy.data.items.account: Account: name, email, username, password, avatar.
pages.privacy.data.items.profile: Profile (optional): birthday, postal code, appearance preferences.
pages.privacy.data.items.providers: Auth providers you connect (e.g., Google, Discord, GitHub): provider IDs.
pages.privacy.data.items.billing: Subscription/billing: Stripe customer ID, subscription status, invoices (from Stripe).
pages.privacy.data.items.usage: Usage: logs for security and service operation (IP, user agent, session IDs).
pages.privacy.data.items.contact: Contact: messages you send via our contact form.
pages.privacy.use.heading: How we use your data
pages.privacy.use.items.account: To create and manage your account and authentication.
pages.privacy.use.items.subscription: To process your membership subscription and payments via Stripe.
pages.privacy.use.items.features: To provide features like profile, preferences, and settings.
pages.privacy.use.items.security: To keep the service secure, prevent abuse, and troubleshoot issues.
pages.privacy.use.items.comms: To communicate service updates, billing notices, and responses to your requests.
pages.privacy.legal.heading: Legal bases
pages.privacy.legal.items.contract: Contract: to provide the service you request (account, subscription, billing).
pages.privacy.legal.items.legitimate: Legitimate interests: operate, secure, and improve the service.
pages.privacy.legal.items.consent: Consent: optional features (e.g., certain cookies) when applicable.
pages.privacy.legal.items.obligation: Legal obligation: invoicing, tax, and accounting requirements.
pages.privacy.share.heading: Sharing
pages.privacy.share.body: We do not sell your data. We share data with service providers only to run the service, for example: Stripe (payments), email delivery, hosting, and error logging. These providers process data on our behalf under agreements consistent with this notice.
pages.privacy.payments.heading: Payments (Stripe)
pages.privacy.payments.body: We use Stripe to process payments. Card data is sent directly to Stripe and never touches our servers. We store your Stripe customer ID and subscription details to manage your membership. Learn more at stripe.com/privacy.
pages.privacy.cookies.heading: Cookies
pages.privacy.cookies.body: We use necessary cookies for sign‑in and security. For more details, see our Cookie policy.
pages.privacy.retention.heading: Retention
pages.privacy.retention.body: We keep your data only as long as needed for the purposes listed above. If you delete your account, we remove or anonymize personal data unless we must keep it longer for legal reasons (e.g., invoices).
pages.privacy.rights.heading: Your rights
pages.privacy.rights.items.access: Access: get a copy of your data.
pages.privacy.rights.items.rectify: Correction: fix inaccurate or incomplete data.
pages.privacy.rights.items.erasure: Deletion: request deletion of your data.
pages.privacy.rights.items.restrict: Restriction & objection: limit or object to certain processing.
pages.privacy.rights.items.port: Portability: receive your data in a machine‑readable format.
pages.privacy.rights.items.withdraw: Withdraw consent where processing relies on consent.
pages.privacy.rights.contact: To exercise your rights, please contact us. You also have the right to complain to your local data protection authority.
pages.privacy.children.heading: Children
pages.privacy.children.body: Our events may include youth activities. Where required, we request consent from guardians. If you believe a child provided personal data without appropriate consent, please contact us and we will take appropriate action.
pages.privacy.transfers.heading: International transfers
pages.privacy.transfers.body: Some providers may process data outside the EEA. When this happens, we use appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses or ensure the provider offers an adequate level of protection.
pages.privacy.security.heading: Security
pages.privacy.security.body: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data. No system is 100% secure, but we continuously improve our safeguards.
pages.privacy.contact.heading: Contact
pages.privacy.contact.address: Address: Skollerudveien 5, 1353 Bærums Verk, Norway · Org.no: 917616140
pages.privacy.changes.heading: Changes to this notice
pages.privacy.changes.body: We will update this page if our practices change. We encourage you to review it periodically.
pages.terms.title: Terms & Legal
pages.terms.summary.respect: Use the website respectfully and lawfully. Don’t abuse or disrupt the service.
pages.terms.summary.content: Content we publish is owned by us or our partners; your content must be yours or licensed.
pages.terms.summary.payments: Membership payments are handled by Stripe; see our Privacy notice for how we handle data.
pages.terms.toc.title: Contents
pages.terms.eula.heading: End User License Agreement (EULA)
pages.terms.eula.p1: These are the terms that govern your use of any software, digital content, or downloadable materials we may provide.
pages.terms.eula.items.restrictions: Restrictions: no reverse engineering, resale, or unlawful use.
pages.terms.eula.items.ip: IP: all rights remain with Spillhuset and/or licensors.
pages.terms.eula.items.termination: Termination: we may terminate access for breach of the EULA.
pages.terms.website.heading: Terms of Use for Website
pages.terms.website.p1: These terms apply to your use of our site and services accessible at ftw.test and related domains.
pages.terms.website.items.acceptable: Acceptable Use: do not disrupt the service, attempt unauthorized access, or violate laws.
pages.terms.website.items.accounts: Accounts: keep your credentials secure and your information accurate.
pages.terms.website.items.copyright: Content: respect copyright and other intellectual property rights.
pages.terms.website.items.disclaimer: Disclaimers: service is provided “as is”; availability may vary.
pages.terms.website.items.changes: Changes: we may update these terms; continued use means acceptance.
pages.terms.privacy.heading: Online Privacy Policy
pages.terms.privacy.p1: We explain how we collect, use, and protect your data in our
pages.terms.privacy.highlights.minimal: We collect only what is necessary to operate your account and membership.
pages.terms.privacy.highlights.nosell: We do not sell personal data. Payments are processed by Stripe.
pages.terms.privacy.highlights.rights: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data at any time.
pages.terms.contact.heading: Contact
pages.terms.contact.body: Have questions? Contact us via the contact form or email.
pages.cookie.title: Cookie policy
pages.cookie.summary.essential: We use only essential and basic preference cookies to run the site.
pages.cookie.summary.stripe: Stripe may set their own cookies during checkout.
pages.cookie.toc.title: Contents
pages.cookie.what.heading: What are cookies?
pages.cookie.what.body: Cookies are small text files stored on your device by your browser. They help websites remember information about your visit, like keeping you signed in or remembering preferences.
pages.cookie.types.heading: Types of cookies we use
pages.cookie.types.items.necessary: Strictly necessary: required for core functionality such as authentication and security.
pages.cookie.types.items.prefs: Preferences: remembers your appearance (light/dark/system) and UI state like the sidebar.
pages.cookie.list.heading: Cookies we use
pages.cookie.list.xsrf: XSRF‑TOKEN: helps protect against cross‑site request forgery. Required for forms and authentication.
pages.cookie.list.session: laravel_session: session cookie that keeps you signed in and remembers state between requests.
pages.cookie.list.appearance: appearance: stores your theme preference. Set by our middleware.
pages.cookie.list.sidebar: sidebar_state: remembers whether the sidebar is open or collapsed.
pages.cookie.list.consent: laravel_cookie_consent: records whether you dismissed/accepted the cookie notice.
pages.cookie.list.note: Note: Cookie names may vary slightly between environments.
pages.cookie.third.heading: Third‑party cookies (Stripe)
pages.cookie.third.body: When you start the subscription checkout, you may be redirected to Stripe. Stripe may set its own cookies to operate their checkout experience.
pages.cookie.manage.heading: How to manage cookies
pages.cookie.manage.body: You can control cookies in your browser settings and delete existing cookies. Disabling necessary cookies may affect site functionality (e.g., sign‑in will not work).
pages.cookie.withdraw.heading: Withdraw consent
pages.cookie.withdraw.body: If you consented to optional cookies in the past, you can withdraw your consent at any time by clearing cookies in your browser or using cookie controls if shown.
pages.cookie.contact.heading: Contact
pages.cookie.contact.body: Questions about this policy? Email web@spillhuset.com or use our contact form.
pages.cookie.changes.heading: Changes to this policy
pages.cookie.changes.body: We may update this policy from time to time. Please review it periodically for changes.
pages.contact.title: Contact
pages.contact.labels.name: Name
pages.contact.labels.subject: Subject
ui.menu.title: Menu
ui.legal.heading: Legal
ui.appearance.heading: Appearance
ui.contact.heading: Contact
ui.contact.email_error: We could not send the email right now. Please try again later. You may send us e-mail through your own mail-client instead. post@spillhuset.com
ui.contact_email.heading: Contact form submission
ui.about.heading: About
ui.about.description: A meetup for gamers – play, compete, win. Follow us on social media for news and events.
cookie-consent::texts.message: Your experience on this site will be improved by allowing cookies.
